entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -11.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
